1.0.0.name: connect20/Lucidel_Analytics
1.0.0.description: Lucidel easily adds next generation analytics to any Magento-powered site. It adds demographic dimensions to your analytics and provides the simplest, clearest insights possible about your site. You will be amazed. Guaranteed!

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
